column1: Smoque BBQ////Chicken - I think this may be the best chicken preparation I have ever had
column2: it originally was taken by the Publican
column3: but I think in terms of chicken
column5: albeit a VERY high 2. The chicken looks EXACTLY like it does on their site
column7: smoked and they browned exterior carrying a ridiculous amount of flavor. I will not go to Smoque and ever not get it.
